title: Delhi Metro Network Analysis
description:
The Data Analysis of Delhi Metro Network project leverages geospatial visualization using Folium to explore the metro network in Delhi. The project focuses on visual representation, mapping stations, and analyzing connectivity patterns. It provides users with an interactive interface to explore metro routes, identify key station hubs, and understand the network structure through layered maps.

Key features include:

Geospatial Visualization: Interactive maps highlighting metro stations and routes.
Station Insights: Detailed station data, including line connectivity and station types.
Network Mapping: Visualization of metro lines with color-coded representations.
This project enhances urban transportation insights, making metro navigation clearer and more intuitive through data-driven visual mapping.
